title: Cardinals set to hire Mike LaFleur as head coach

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Cardinals set to hire Mike LaFleur as head coach
sources.description: The younger brother of Packers head coach Matt LaFleur, Mike LaFleur spent the last three seasons as the Rams' offensive coordinator.
